attributes.action: Seek greater cooperation with Canada, New Zealand and Australia.
attributes.additional_details: With the re-election of Donald J Trump his administration appears to be taking a increasingly Isolationist approach to foreign policy challenging the United States role as leader of the western free world.  This puts the United Kingdom in a fragile situation attempting to balance relations between United States and The European Union possibly having to choose between the two that will strengthen divisions between Leave and Remain voters. Parliament should explore and debate CANZUK corruption.
attributes.background: Seek greater economic, political and military corruption with Canada, New Zealand and Australia to strengthen our influence and power to project our values abroad to combat competitor nations such as China and Russia in the face of US decline. Laying the foundations for a Canzuk union.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/708393
